'''Allan's Dilemma''' is a [[Random Event|randomly occurring World Quest]] that can occur in various places across [[Mondstadt]].

==Steps==
# Defeat the monsters and save [[Allan]]
#* {{Enemy|Hilichurl|x=3}}
# Talk to Allan

==Rewards==
{{Transclude|Random Event|Rewards}}
==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|Allan is in trouble.}}
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Approaching Allan)
:'''Paimon:''' Look over there – someone is being attacked!
:'''Paimon:''' Quick, help them out before something terrible happens!
:;(After defeating the hilichurls)
:'''Allan:''' Thank you Traveler, you saved me!
:'''Allan:''' I never expected there to be monsters here.
:'''Allan:''' I'm just lucky to have run into you. Please, take these for your trouble.
{{Dialogue end}}
